tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE face_recognition_data (
    person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_image BYTEA,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    recognition_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE facial_recognition_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    image_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE face_pattern_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_id INT,
    pattern_type VARCHAR(50),
    pattern_strength INT
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    pattern_type VARCHAR(50),
    trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FaceMatches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face1_id INT,
    face2_id INT,
    confidence FLOAT,
    match_time TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE facial_recognition_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    person_name VARCHAR(50),
    image_url TEXT,
    facial_features JSON
)

CREATE TABLE facial_encodings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encoding BYTEA,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE facial_matches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT REFERENCES facial_recognition_data(id),
    match_id INT REFERENCES facial_recognition_data(id),
    confidence FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE facial_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_level VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE facial_statistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statistic_name VARCHAR(50),
    statistic_value BIGINT,
    date DATE
)
